item.source: Wow, ive never had this error before![resolved]

item.title: Wow, ive never had this error before![resolved]
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Try making it look like this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType = 58) { //sspider } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 18) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomguard(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
It’s because you don’t have an opening bracket for the closing bracket on the second line to close.

Read full topic

i added the } and the void under it, if i just search link 1174 it comes up with

}
